name: Centaur's Axe
flavor_text: You see a heavy axe embedded deeply in the ground. After several unsuccessful attempts by your army to remove it, you tightly grip the handle of the axe and effortlessly pull it free.
notes: The result of the Attack die may be tripled for purposes other than attacking, e.g. for playing the [Inferno spell](../spells/inferno.md). In that case, the artifact can also be played after the Attack die roll.
